title: Courage and heroism during the war in the film "It's All Quiet in These Parts"

sources.title: Courage and heroism during the war in the film "It's All Quiet in These Parts"
sources.description:
The story is about the polar aviators who showed courage and heroism during the war, defending the distant borders of our country from the attacks of the Nazi invaders.

Director: George Shchukin
Screenwriters: George Shchukin, George Svirsky
Composer: Ruben Vladimir
Operator: Viktor Listopadov
Production designers: Tamara Antonova, Boris Tsarev

Starring: Nikonenko Sergey, Gluzsky Mikhail, Beishenaliev Bolot, Gritsenko Nikolai, Springfeld Pavel, Timofeev Nikolai, Krasheninnikov Gennady, Yurchenko Boris, Zakharchenko Vadim, Gutierrez Angel
